tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We found Dr. Nagaveni to be the perfect mixture of professionalism and patient friendliness. We only started seeing her in the final month of pregnancy, but she quickly got up to date and prescribed steps to be followed in all aspects including diet, exercise to ensure a smooth delivery. During the delivery itself, She handled everything with calmness and skill, keeping us well informed every step of the way and taking my wife comfort and preferences in mind as much as possible. Thanks to her, my wife was able to deliver our precious, healthy daughter the natural way who has filled our life with joy. Even her team  did a great job, of course ably led by Dr. Nagaveni. We strongly believe that had we consulted Dr. Nagaveni from the beginning of the pregnancy, our experience would have been even smoother. She communicates very clearly and makes you comfortable with any asking any questions or doubts you may have. It was also very obvious that she makes it a point to keep up to date with all latest research in her field and uses all tools at her disposal to benefit of her patients. She is always quick to answer anytime you may need to call her and occasionally when is unable to calls back as soon as she is able to.  There is never any doubt that her patient's best interest is her priority.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Prenatal Checkup,Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnancy care and management,
review:
Being new in Bangalore, I received Dr Nagaveni‚Äôs reference from a neighbor. We had initially met her to take a 2nd opinion as I had faced a subchorionic hemorrhage in my 1st pregnancy.

I have to mention that while Dr Nagaveni‚Äôs reviews online are fabulous, she‚Äôs even more amazing as a person! While I initially met her to take a 2nd opinion, she remembered the background we discussed on the phone and was equipped to take things forward from there. It didn‚Äôt take us long to trust her 100%.

When I encountered an early miscarriage in my 1st pregnancy, Dr Nagaveni stayed very practical when it came to her treatment and left no stone unturned in our journey to becoming parents. She advised only the relevant tests to be taken at the right time, suggested the right weight, exercise and lifestyle changes, etc for both my husband and I, before we conceived again.

As for the 2nd pregnancy, given that I had fibroids, she recommended a scan to assess their position and unlike most doctors, did not suggest surgical removal, as it was not necessary. While the initial trimester was challenging, Dr Nagaveni was instrumental in ensuring all scans and tests were carried out in a timely manner and even checked in periodically between visits to ensure everything was on track. Despite her busy schedule, there is not a single instance where she has not reverted to a message at the end of a busy day.

Dr Nagaveni also took the required precautions and monitored my BP and blood sugar especially during the last trimester when uterine/umbilical artery resistance values were high on scans. Through judicious monitoring, she ensured that this pregnancy was not unnecessarily classified as high risk, which honestly saved us from additional tests, visits, scans and stress.

Till the end, she advocated a natural birth and shared the exercises, diet, etc to prepare for the same. However, on account of fetal distress, we needed a caesarean at the last moment. Even in the OT, she is extremely calm, confident and she and her team make the process seem like a breeze. She is a true expert at putting the patient at ease at this crucial time.

Dr Nagaveni has played a pivotal role in our journey to parenthood and we cannot imagine going through the same without her medical expertise, empathetic nature and positivity. We wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone looking at a highly professional gynecologist and an even better human being to guide them with their pregnancy/medical journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hello All,We were trying for baby from past two years and visited different doctors but nothing helped. We found Dr. Nagaveni mam profile in practo and visited here for consultation. At the 1st visit itself we found there is some positive vibes with her as she is very kind and listens all your problems patiently and suggests better treatment with her kind words. By gots grace my wife conceived in immediate next month. From then we continued treatment with her. Kind in her nature, patiance is admirable. She was available 24/7 over phone also for any kind queries and situation. On 7th July we were blessed with Baby boy without any complications to both baby and mother.Thank you Dr. Nagaveni mamRegards,Managala & Naveen Family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
"Dear Dr. Nagaveni,

I wanted to take a moment to express my heartfelt gratitude for the exceptional care and expertise you provided during my pregnancy and delivery. Despite the complications that arose, your skill and dedication ensured a successful normal delivery, and I'm thrilled to have welcomed a healthy child.

Your professionalism, compassion, and support made a significant difference in my experience. *** ***** *** *** ** *** **** ******* I've ever encountered, and I feel fortunate to have had you by my side throughout this journey.

I would highly recommend you to others seeking exceptional medical care. Your expertise and caring demeanor make you an outstanding healthcare provider, and I have no doubt that others will benefit from your care just as I did.

Thank you again for your outstanding care and for helping me achieve the birth experience I desired.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Cervical Cerclage,
review: First n foremost I wholeheartedly thank Dr. Nagaveni for making me deliver a beautiful girl baby on 22nd July 2024. This is my first pregnancy and from the beginning itself I consulted Dr. Nagaveni for all the monthly check-ups and followed all her instructions and diet. In the 6 month i had faced cervix issue due  to which I underwent cervical cerclage by her only and advised for complete bed rest. Finally with the help of doctor I had normal delivery which I didn't expect also. Thanks to the doctor for supporting me and encouraging me a lot from the starting and mainly during my labour.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nagaveni was absolutely amazing throughout the entire process of my wife's delivery. From the moment we met her, she treated us with warmth and professionalism that immediately put us at ease. Her care extended beyond medical expertise; she took care of us like a family member, ensuring we felt supported and informed every step of the way.

One thing that stood out was her responsiveness. Dr. Nagaveni was always available to answer our calls and messages promptly, which was incredibly reassuring during such a pivotal time. Her ability to communicate clearly and compassionately helped alleviate any concerns we had, making the entire experience smoother and less stressful.

During the delivery itself, Dr. Nagaveni's skill and expertise were evident. She handled everything with confidence and precision, ensuring both the health of my wife and the baby were her top priorities. Her calm demeanor and reassuring words were a source of comfort during labor.

Overall, I cannot recommend Dr. Nagaveni highly enough. Her dedication to her patients is exemplary, and her caring approach sets a standard for healthcare professionals. If you're looking for a doctor who not only excels in her field but also genuinely cares for her patients, Dr. Nagaveni is the ideal choice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Nagaveni's exceptional care made my entire second pregnancy journey a positive experience. Having been my gynecologist during my first pregnancy as well, I had complete confidence in her expertise. Her kindness and warmth immediately put me at ease, and she patiently answered all my questions, no matter how many I had. Throughout both pregnancies, she genuinely cared about me and strongly advocated a Normal Delivery for me.  Her experience and skills were evident in her consultations and delivery approach.  Even when she switched to Motherhood Hospital, I knew I had to follow her because the quality of care she provided was irreplaceable. Dr. Nagaveni's constant availability throughout both pregnancies was invaluable. I always felt like I was more than just a patient; she truly cared about me and my journey to motherhood. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Nagaveni to anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled gynecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Pregnancy,Pregnancy Check Up,High Risk Pregnancy management,
review:
Dr. Nagaveni is a very ************* *** approachable gynaecologist who engages patients with empathy, and compassion. During our high-risk pregnancy, she guided us with reassurance and expertise, addressing every concern and question we had. Her dedication and care throughout the pregnancy and delivery were outstanding.

Her ability to explain complex medical information in a clear and understandable way made us feel empowered and informed throughout the process. Her kindness, warmth, and encouragement helped alleviate our anxieties and fears.

Thanks to Dr. Nagaveni's exceptional care, we were blessed with a beautiful and healthy baby girl. We are forever grateful for her expertise, support, and compassion.

We highly recommend Dr. Nagaveni to anyone seeking exceptional gynaecological care especially in high risk pregnancies.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We visited the Disha clinic by checking the review of the clinic and Nagaveni mam and it was close to our home.

I am giving this review post delivery of my wife and I can proudly say Nagaveni mam is superb. We visited to her during the full 9 months of our journey.

She is always approachable, guides her patients in the best possible way. Whenever my wife has doubts regarding anything, mam was just a one msg away. She is full of positivity and always gives the best suggestions to resolve every medical need.

She not only responds promptly but also personally follows up on urgent cases, ensuring that we always felt supported and cared for.

I highly recommend Nagaveni mam to everyone for a seamless pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got to know about Dr. Nagaveni based on search for best gyaenocologist near me and I now know why she showed up as the top result. She is the best possible doctor I could have come to, to deliver my first baby. She is extremely friendly, explains why she suggests each medicine and test and guides us through the entire process in a very smooth manner. She has always been extra cautious with my wife as she had a couple of miscarriages prior to this. Finally on the D-day she delivered my first baby through normal delivery. I was pretty nervous about going into the labour room with my wife but the doctor ensured I got an opportunity to do so and got me in just a minute or two prior to the delivery. It was a precious feeling to hold the baby for the first time. My wife and I would forever be grateful to Dr. Nagaveni for this experience and would recommend her to all our friends and family.

I completely trusted her decisions on the timing and method of delivery as I had multiple issues developing towards the end of the pregnancy. I definitely recommend her and can't thank her enough for safely bringing my bundle of joy to the world.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was year long journey with Dr Nagaveni(Motherhood Hospital - HRBR) maam and it was my second child. We consulted her right from day 1 and the decision was with a lot of research and reviews. 
We went through a lot of trauma during our first pregnancy with multiple doctors consulting, but honestly, we regret that why we did not choose Dr Nagaveni as our choice during the first pregnancy.
I must admit and will share my experience in short

1. Throughly professional.
2. Availability including phone calls anytime. To my surprise whenever I visit the hospital she's always there attending other patients either in OT or OPD.
3. Her courteous and patience, and responds to every concern we ask.
4. Trust the Dr. and you are in good and safe hands.

Thank you maam for your exceptional kindness and the positive impact you have made in my life.

review:
I would like to extend my deepest gratitude and appreciation for the exceptional care provided by Dr. Nagaveni throughout my maternity journey.

I went into completing full term and Dr Nagaveni was continuously monitoring baby health. Her advice was always best of both traditional and modern practices. This was my 2nd pregnancy and first one was induced. We were concerned on why im not even into mild contractions and labor in last 1-2 weeks, she was reassuring us that everything is normal and never pushed for induction or any other intervention. She was crystal clear in explaining us the next steps and helped me in delivering healthy baby full term as normal delivery.

I feel it‚Äôs incredible feat for myself and I believe no-one other than Dr Nagaveni who could make me trust the process.

Right from attending deliveries in the morning till midnight, she hustles between HRBR Motherhood and Disha Clinic. Inspite of such hectic worklife, Dr. Nagaveni‚Äôs calm demeanor and empathetic support were invaluable. I wonder how she can manage her personal and professional life handling those many mothers to be and be such a composed person she is. From past 1 year, she never postponed our appointments and we never saw a grim face. On the day of labor she assured me that she will be available within half n hr anytime during the night and she was present by 8 00 AM at my delivery as promised.

This level of commitment, unwavering dedication and care makes Dr. Nagaveni one of the best Doctors in this profession and We highly recommend her to anyone seeking a gynecologist who truly puts their patients first.

Thank you Dr Nagaveni for all your support and care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor Nagaveni was referred to me by my friend. I had visited her in Disha clinic over a year back for a general checkup and she was very approachable and sweet. For my pregnancy as well I wanted to continue consulting with her. She was extremely patient and friendly. As it was my first pregnancy I had a lot of questions and she patiently answered all my queries and in some instances provided reassurance by citing live examples. At one point my baby was not gaining weight and I was extremely worried but she helped fix the issue and reassured me. After every visit I would feel positive and happy. She guided me so well throughout my pregnancy journey that I would look forward to my routine check-ups. 
During labor I almost gave up and asked her to do a c-section. She convinced me and I ended up having a normal delivery. She was so tolerant throughout, despite my multiple requests to go for c-section. She was so pleasant and patient even then. She was so confident that I could do it and motivated me. Her confidence and positivity kept me going. She gave me options to ease my pain. She is so quick to give solutions and make things work, this speaks volumes of her work and dedication. Everytime my baby's heart rate dropped or if he didn't move down the birth canal, she knew what had to be done. Her quick response to each situation helped immensely. She was so calm and composed during the last phase of labor which led to a smooth delivery. 

She was always one phone call/text away. She would respond immediately to any queries, no matter the time at which I would reach out. My respect and admiration for her has grown manifold from my first meeting with her. 

I would highly recommend her to anyone seeking a good gyneac/obstetrician in Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was nine months back, being from Chennai the skeptical me was never convinced of a delivery for my wife in banglore... However with heavy heart i started the scouting for the best Gynec near our place in Kalkare (Rammurthy Nagar) ... While Google gave us enough options we ended up with choosing Ms Nagaveni (Purely based on the Google ratings and some reviews) . My First visit was equally inquisitive and wanted to quiz the Doctor as much to understand if we are in the right place being a new parent and expecting our first lil one .... But she was patient and ever smiling to help us out not just during the first visit but throughout our paternity.... The way she guided us with Dos. Donts , what works with her other patients , what's the best case and every other silly questions we use to ask ... She infact was so approachable that even a night ping in WhatsApp during time of distress she was always there for us.. as days passed , we were nearing the delivery and my wife s only request was that Ms Nagaveni is with her during the delivery and nothing more .... Even when we theoretically know when to approach hospital for labour , the instinctive reaction in times of doubt is to immediately call our doctor and she was so kind to check on the situation and guide us on when to reach ... As my wife stepped into labour and I was at the peak of stress , the glance of Dr Nagaveni made us feel little at ease and she was around one way or other through out the delivery phase .... At one point the pain was such that we wanted to opt for a C section , but Dr Nagaveni was very calm and she had the art to convince and calm down my wife to get her through with normal delivery which I found it really strange in the age of current hospitals... My respect grew multifold for her at that point and I was super happy and proud that we had got the right and best doctor on board ... As promised and guided she helped us deliver a healthy baby and became a integral part of our life ... A simple thank you won't suffice for what she has helped us with .... A huge shout out to Dr Nagaveni and her entire delivery team in the hospital for their guidance and support ....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Cervical Cerclage,Pregnancy Check Up,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,
review:
Thank you so much Dr Nagaveni R from bottom of heart for taking such good care of us during pregnancy .
I have conceived naturally and have started consulting Dr from the start of pregnancy .We are glad and I would say it was a blessing that we had chosen her .
Until mid of 5th month of pregnancy everything was going smooth , but around 19th week I felt I am having lot of watery discharge . Doctor asked us to come to clinic immediately, then after getting the scan done it was confirmed that there is no amniotic fluid leakage but my cervix has shortened . Doctor didn‚Äôt panic us she told us to wait till a week , take complete bed rest and see . After a week cervix length didn‚Äôt increase so she asked us to go for emergency cerclage operation , we were very  scared and stressed but she gave us confident explained us everything . Surgery was done and I was admitted in hospital for 5 days , I would say she took really right decison I realised later . This procedure is for 1 day and many doctor sent you home after 24 hours but she asked me to stay and actually it was for my good and for my baby becoz if I would have come to my home there would have been so many confusion panic situation and if some problem  would have come travelling to hospital would have worsen my situation I feel . After this I was in complete bed rest and doctor was always available through what‚Äôs app message or call . Even in night she used to respond to my query . She was very considerate and thoughtful she didn‚Äôt unnecessarily asked me to come to clinic or go for Scan until and unless if it is very necessary .  
After 32 weeks my complications kept on increasing . My pregnancy journey became more challenging . But it  was doctor assuring voice and positive attitude which helped us kept going . I developed below complication 32 weeks onwards apart from the short cervix length issue which I was already having .
1.Gestational Diabetics .
2.  Severe Polyhydramnious 
3.Cholestasis of pregnancy 
4.Hypertension 
 But doctor always with her smiling face , knowledge and positive attitude gave us hope that for every problem there is a solution . She helped us manage and monitor each and every thing . The best part is she is very calm and never panics you by telling big big medical terms and complications , she always focus on solution and explains the approach how we will deal with this complications. After 32 weeks I was having itching when I reported to doctor , doctor asked me to do a Blood test . But even before it showed in my report  she with her knowledge and analysis has confirmed that I have cholestasis of pregnancy and she asked to start on low dose of medicine and repeat the blood test after a week . And yes she was correct my bile acid and SGPt and Sgopt was increasing . After that she increased my dose and advice me to repeat the blood test twice a week and do scan once a week and keep a checks on baby movement . She helped manage GD with proper diet and medicine . She monitored my case very closely and always kept a eye on my Reports and everything . After this my platelet count also started decreasing after every week . Earlier she has told us that due to cholestasis and other complications we should be ready for delivery after completing 36 week and she told she will try for normal delivery .This was surprising for me that inspite of so many complications she is telling we can try for normal delivery . But as we know ‚ÄúMan proposes and God disposes .‚Äù Around 34 weeks 6 days my bile acid was increasing too much , and so many complications were already there . Doctor recommended us to go for c section at 35 week as it would be risk to wait more . We have full trust and confidence on Doctor so without giving any second thought I got admitted on 26.02.2023 and 27.02.2023 our baby girl arrived . Our ‚Äúbrave girl ‚Äú . As doctor has already taken precautions before hand and I was sterioded  so our baby was born healthy and breathing fresh air . But since I had severe amniotic fluid some water had gone in my baby lungs due to which my baby got admitted to Nicu for 48hours . But yes , again her instinct and analysis , recommendation proved to be right . If we would have delayed it would have caused more problems, more damage to my baby . 
We are grateful to doctor entire team of motherhood hospital as well as Disha clinic staff . 
‚ÄúDoctor is very talented , prompt in her response , very proactive and prompt and takes right decision at right time , friendly , and she always remember each and every  even minute details of her patients complications , report  which is something so amazing and impressive. ‚Äú We highly recommend doctor , you can chose doctor for your pregnancy journey without giving any second thought . 
Last but not the least whenever we felt stressed and worried doctor always assured us that if you come till here be positive , everything will be fine . I can‚Äôt even explain to what your reassuring voice meant ma‚Äôam . 
It was sai baba blessings that we chose her and are blessed with baby girl .
Om sai ram .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It‚Äôs the Sai baba blessing that I met Dr. Ngavaeni and my journey of second pregnancy started in the guidance of her. What struck to me about her was her patience of listening to patients and give them physical and moral gain.

When I learnt that I had conceived, I decided to go to an renowned Doctor nearby. It was a Thursday. It‚Äôs the direction of Sai that even having the appointment with that doctor, my appointment with the doctor was not listed. Looking at my age criticality and the past abortion and recent miscarriage with 6 months, I was more tensed about the pregnancy and wanted to consult doctor immediately. Suddenly on the way to my daughter‚Äôs skating class, I saw the Disha clinic and recalled few of people recommended Dr Nagaveni. Immediately I called Disha clinic and took the appointment and met Dr Nagaveni.
I had always wanted a doctor who was efficient and contemporary in her thought process at the same time. She is proficient in her field- provides a lot of time to her patients, efficient in diagnosis, believes in natural medication and has an eye for detail. But what truly differentiates her from other doctors is her humanity.

Mam, u may or may not remember some of the instances but the following instances will be etched in my mind forever when I think of you.

1.	The first meeting, when you assured me that baby will be fine and I can still keep my baby. The words gave me a big trust on my Sai that, at this age with multiple complications, I can still keep my baby. 
2.	When I discussed with you regarding my elder daughter health issue, you assured me that it‚Äôs the Sai blessing, Its not 100% guarantee that my second baby will get the same health issue as my elder one.
3.	Its always you, when you assured me  it‚Äôs the Sai direction, even without any pre planning for baby and the point of restart my career again, that I am expecting for my second little one.
4.	When the growth of the baby was low during my anomaly scan, you gave me the strength that it will fine by 7th month.
5.	I was really getting worried about my kidney valve issue about my baby, you confirmed words that it will be fine by 8th month was blessing for me. Don‚Äôt know how your words came true, by 8th month baby growth and valve issue got fixed automatically.
6.	When my husband was out of station, and I was not able to sleep due to my mother in law‚Äôs health, my Blood pressure was so much fluctuating. You guidance made me to feel better and sleep better.
7.	When I rushed to you because of the discharge during my 5th month, I was really worried that my water bug has got burst. Thanks for reassuring me that my baby was fine. The moral support you gave me during that time was really helpful as my husband was out of station because of his mother‚Äôs health.
8.	When I rushed to you after 9 months, because of the pain in midnight. You assured me that it was not labour pain. It was because of the baby continuous movement.
9.	You always suggested to do deliver on 1st and 2nd dec and not to delay anymore as the baby is developed and its risky because of my health. My fluid level was high. Blood pressure and sugar level was fluctuating.
10.	Thanks for the understanding and did the surgery as per our fixed time on 6th Dec. 
11.	Thanks for the advice to do the delivery asap, looking at the condition, it was quite obvious that little more days delay would have spoiled my all dreams.
12.	Whenever I fell prey to breakdowns, you just sat and let me speak and gave me the support like a real close friend would.

I cant even explain you what your reassuring voice has meant to me.

Sunil and I thank you, from the bottom of our hearts for being so thoughtful.

We wish you all the very best.

Om Sairam!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This was our second pregnancy when we started seeing Dr.Nagaveni and the content below is purely based on our experience. This might get a bit long but I'm sure it would be useful and comforting for couples planning for their big moment.

I will start with our first delivery experience in our home town far away from Bangalore 6 years ago. Unfortunately, we didn't had a good experience with the gynaecologist we consulted during that pregnancy and my wife also developed some complication at the delivery time, thankful to gods to help us sail through those times. So she was a lot apprehensive about reaching out to a female gynaecologist again (just one of those few biases you make up in your mind.) PS: Our 6 yr-old son is absolutely fit and healthy, and has waited eagerly along with us to welcome his younger sibling.

So it took me some to convince her to visit Dr.Nagaveni based on the reviews on practo and owing to proximity to the Ovum Kothanur clinic. And I'm not exaggerating when I say that my wife was floored with her first interaction and returned home all happy and optimistic. Dr. Nagaveni was all ears to all my wife's questions and in fact when we both went together explained to us in great detail about all the medical procedures and terms which we had learnt over web or were just curious about.

Due to a certain clinical reason, we were also asked to refer to a Haematologist, and the best part is doctor suggested us where we could get the tests done at a lower price. To be honest, she is the first doctor we have met who showed genuine concern towards underlying cost of different tests or consultations. And suggested for a better and economical service if available, whenever asked. Kudos to her.

Cut to 17th August, we were blessed with a healthy baby and due to her timely precautions and alertness we never had to went through the complications we underwent during the first pregnancy. Please note that clinically there were ~10-15% chances of recurrence of the same complication in second pregnancy. She was always there to morally uplift us and gave us a clear understanding of issues at hand whenever we had some doubt.

Last but not the least, our whole family would like to thank Dr.Nagaveni from the bottom of our hearts to be there when we needed someone we can trust on. And thus, we would strongly recommend Dr.Nagaveni to anyone who is planning or already planned for pregnancy. It's a long physical and emotional journey where you need a strong mentor to sail you through. Thank you ma'm once again!

Best regards,
Geetika & Tanmay

review:
Dr. Nagaveni is truly incredible and exceptional. Not only has she taken great care of my health, but also she is lovely to speak with at every appointment. It‚Äôs rare to find a doctor that combines such personal touches and care for a patient as a person with outstanding quality of medical care. I highly recommend becoming her patient!

Having said all that, I would love to share my pregnancy journey .
I was heavily bleeding one night and that was 7th week of my pregnancy,seeing that gush of blood ,I had lost all hopes.
I called my doctor and she asked us to visit hospital , we went there and doctor was available late night, she did the scan and with God's grace, my baby was fine and the bleeding was because of subchroinic hematoma.I had taken the medicines as prescribed and was on complete bed rest for a month or two.
Things might not have been the same ,had my doctor not been there that night,it's because of her availability and timely treatment ,everything went well.
I must say, she is the first doctor that I have come across who would answer all queries no matter what time of the day you call or message her, she would never miss to reply.

review:

review:
In my 24th week of Pregnancy there was a turmoil  in the form of our growth scan .We consulted our previous Ob/gyn . For some reasons madam couldn't help us through the abnormal reports . We were shattered. Decided to go for Amniocentesis as advised by my doc. As a second opinion we consulted Dr Nagaveni madam . We visited her post going through all the google reviews. Our experience with her has been amazing and all the reviews about her are 100% true.
She has been very supportive, friendly & approachable. We were very concerned & nervous as it was first pregnancy with an anomaly observed but her positive aura and approach made the journey much easier.
No hi-fi medicines /unnecessary tests were prescribed. From the day 1 we moved on to Dr Nagaveni madam and started our journey with her , it was always pleasant and delightful experience for us . Till last minute Dr Nagaveni madam  was very confident and pushed us for normal delivery till the end. Throughout delivery she was very much available from 6 am to 10 pm  , supportive, positive and kept on encouraging . At last last I underwent C-Section on my choice. We were blessed with a baby girl  and both me and baby were healthy. Madam also was kind enough to remove my Fibroid and Hematoma . Also brilliantly dealt post partum complications and Pain management  . I could walk on the day 3 of C- Section.And could sit down criss-crossed on my day 7th of surgery.

She is the best we could have asked for this journey.

I highly recommend her to all the to-be moms.

Thankyou Dr Nagaveni Madam  . we love you <3

context: Labor and Delivery,Prenatal Checkup,Caesarean Section (C Section),
review:
I was recommended to consult Dr. Nagaveni for prenatal checkup and delivery by my friends. That was one of the best decisions of my pregnancy journey. 
From day 1 of the consultation till date she has been extremely kind and patient in answering all my queries and ensured that all my doubts are cleared before taking any decisions. From the anomaly scan it was clear that my uterine artery PI resistance was high and it could lead to certain scenarios like SGA, IUGR, gestational hypertension etc. I was well informed about each of them and was asked to monitor BP, sugar etc on timely basis. Monthly scans were done to ensure baby‚Äôs growth was adequate however in the end I had an IUGR case which made me a bit anxious about my baby‚Äôs health however the doctor explained with her personal experience that such babies eventually gains weight and grows normally post delivery. I ended up with a well informed C section coz baby‚Äôs head was too high and wasn‚Äôt engaged till week 39. Doctor explained every minute detail of how normal delivery progresses and why the chances of normal delivery were less in my case by week 39. I am completely satisfied that Dr. Nagaveni was an integral part of my pregnancy journey and I would highly recommend her to all my friends planning their pregnancy.

During my 36th week we found that amniotic fluid was low. She immediately guided the hospital   to give me IV   infusion which helped prolong my pregnancy by another 2 Weeks. We decided through doctors guidance to induce labour and safely deliver our baby . The hospital was already prepared  and informed by doctor about my case before I reached.  At 38 weeks we delivered a healthy baby boy through normal vaginal Delivery.  During my delivery time doctor was attending to another C section patient at the same time.Yet   she handled both cases wit confidence and calm. I continue to visit her for post partum care and visit disha clinic to consult dr. Suresh gowda for our newborn . Her encouraging  nature and team of nurses at motherhood and at disha clinic  made it possible for me to have a very positive and memorable birth experience. My husband and I recommend doctor Nagaveni  and we are immensely grateful for helping us enter into the journey of parenthood.

context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We are very delighted to share our experience with Dr. Nagaveni. We were so blessed to meet maam before planning our second child. 
On our first visit, we were delighted that Dr. Nagaveni maam listened us very patiently and explained us the systematic approach. With her proper guidance and support, I conceived within a very few months.

Best thing about maam is that she is very friendly and always reachable to our queries. She shared her personal number with us for any kind of support during pregnancy and always responded to our queries instantly even during working hours or late evening.  At times, i truly felt that I was her ONLY patient. 
During the pregnancy, when i had gestational diabetes, maam was so concerned about the risk and was checking my sugar readings regularly and guided us with proper diet and routine. She was very positive and with her proper care, I delivered a healthy baby boy.

Truly speaking, i had never met such a Doctor like Nagaveni maam. My pregnancy journey was memorable with maam. I can surely say, she is not only the best doctor in Bangalore but also a great mentor for prenatal journeys as well. We will highly recommend maam.

Thank you so much maam !!  We are always grateful to you.

Regards
Ipsita & Deepak

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am very delighted to share our experience with Doctor Nagaveni R, under her guidance and support during my wife's 9months of pregnancy she had no problems and delivered a healthy baby girl on 12.12.2022 through normal delivery.

Dr. Nagaveni is very soft spoken, calm and very knowledgeable. 

She will listen your all concerns and handles the problem very carefully, best thing about her is, she is always reachable over WhatsApp/call for any doubt/clarification, in our case we just forwarded test report to her, and she had immediately call back to us to explain the next course of action.
 
My wife's Quadruple test indicated the chance of pre-eclampsia, and we were bit scared of it, but Dr Nagaveni Mam explained that very well and started medicine immediately.
 
We are very grateful for her level of attention during pregnancy and delivery. 

We both are very thankful to Dr Nagaveni Mam and her staff. I would without any doubt recommend her for a gynaecologist / obstetrician consultation.

Thank you, ma'am, for all of your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My journey with Dr Nagaveni Mam was wonderful. I have been referred from my sister and have started my journey  for gyenic issues and Fibroid surgery.  She identifies the problem very well and listens to you with lot of patience. 

Dr. Nagaveni is an excellent doctor with lot of experience and is very knowledgeable. She is very friendly, clarifies all your doubts well in advance before any procedure/treatment. Initially I was worried about surgery but I'm really glad that I met Dr. Nagaveni Mam and my Laproscopic surgery went so smooth. I was very much comfortable with the doctor and she took very good care of me throughout the journey. I would highly recommend Dr. Nagaveni for any gyenic issues. Dr. Nagaveni mam is also a very good human being and always has smile on her face.

Overall Dr Nagaveni mam has always been very supportive and motivating throughout the treatment. Many thanks to mam for her kindness, guidance and support.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Caesarean Section (C Section),Family Planning,
review:
Quoting my wife, Kiran, here:

"An absolute gold-standard, Dr.Nagaveni treated me with such love & care that it was almost impossible to feel the tension. So much so that this was my second pregnancy and I was quite certain that my pregnancy would be normal, non-invasive, built on my body's intelligence & abilities, rather than too much intervention, unless unavoidable. It turned out to be a C-Section delivery due to breech conditions. But thanks to Dr. Nagaveni, my expectations for a smooth delivery fell in place effortlessly. Dr.Nagaveni pleasant and positive demeanour put me at ease immediately. She never bothered us with any unnecessary & complicated detail about the pregnancy that could have thrown us off the edge. We just waited with butterflies in our stomachs to welcome our child. She conducted the delivery in 5 mins after administering the anesthesia. The motto 'We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is not an act, but a habit'. This accurately defines my Doctor.

Thanks Dr. Nagaveni ma'am (the Lady Tigress' Prowess) and the Disha Clinic (@kothanur Junction) team. You read the situation from my first consultation in Dec 2021 and finally helped us experience a comfortable delivery. We are grateful to you and wish more expecting mothers consult you to build their pregnancies on their abilities.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy with PCOD,
review:
I have visited Dr Nagaveni since day one my pregnancy was confirmed. At first, we were not confident to go ahead with our pregnancy, but after meeting the doctor and talking to her we were confident to go ahead. In my NT scan we found I had bilateral notch (a new term, never heard before) I was scared and nervous, but Dr again gave us the right medication at the right time which gave us confidence. Latter as my pregnancy progressed, I developed gestational diabetes and low hemoglobin, she helped with the diet plan. At 37th week Baby was breach; she was there to give me the right exercises and get the baby to position. 
Finally, at 39th week with 12 hrs of labor pain was able to deliver my angle who was 3.34 kgs.

In short Dr. Nagaveni is the best gynecologist in Bangalore. Even though I stay 15kms away I decided to stick with her for many reasons. Her patience and knowledge in the field are the topmost. She is always available on WhatsApp‚Äôs, call, messages. We have no words to express how grateful and thankful we are to her. I definitely recommend Dr Nagaveni for all the issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We visited Dr Nagaveni for the first time after my wife was diagnosed with PCOD and we were looking at possibilities for conceiving a child. She was very warm and friendly. She sat down with us for about 45 mins answering all our queries and explaining the possible medical treatments to aid us in conception. For us it was a long journey of about 3 years with 2 non-viable pregnancies before my wife could finally conceive. And during all these years, Dr Nagaveni has journeyed with us with much empathy. She not only provided expert medical care but also emotional support. She is 100% committed to her patients. She was always available and responsive both during in-person visits and on phone calls/texts during emergencies. To cut the long story short, it was Dr Nagaveni who delivered our child recently and continues to provide postnatal care for my wife. My wife and I have been very pleased with Dr Nagaveni's expertise and care and would wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking assistance with infertility issues, pregnancy, and childbirth. *** ** ********** *** ** *** **** ************ ** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Nagaveni a fairy god mother sent to earth by the gods to make the pregnancy journey easy smooth and lovable for all mothers..we visited her both in her clinic disha as well as motherhood hospital hrbr layout for my pregnancy.This was our first pregnancy.By god's grace and with help of this fairy i delivered a beautiful prince on May 29th 2022 normally. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fibroids Removal Surgery,Myomectomy,Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
I really feel blessed to meet Dr. Nagaveni without whom this entire journey of motherhood would not have been possible. One of the best doctor I have ever known. *** ** *** ** *** ****** *** treats patients with utmost care and is extremely sincere for her responsibilities. I had a high risk pregnancy with huge fibroid uterus (approx 16cm, 1.8kg) with RH Negative status with beta thalassemia trait and She has done my elective Lower segment Cesarian section (LSCS) to make my delivery successful along with myomectomy. I felt safe in her hand through out this journey as she helped me to manage all my fears, doubts which I had related to my pregnancy. She is available to us over phone and WhatsApp for any situations to support. I am really thankful and grateful to Dr. Nagaveni for being around me in this entire journey of pregnancy till delivery and postpartum and very much concerned about the baby as well. 

I recommend Dr.Nagaveni to all expecting mothers or who are trying to conceive. She explains everything in detail and will address all your queries and doubts.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: From my very first visit with Dr. Nagaveni, I was instantly comfortable. She was very understanding, patient and reassuring through my entire pregnancy and delivery. At each visit, she took the time to explain procedures and practices while listening and addressing any of my doubts and concerns. Her medical expertise is excellent - even though there were some complications during my delivery, she maintained a calm demeanor, and encouraged me to keep going even when things were tough. If it weren't for her, i may have been rushed to have an emergency c section. I was also very touched by the level of detailed care - she paid keen attention to every little detail and aspect of mine and my baby's health. No matter what time of day it was, she was always available. In fact, she would call me if I had not come in to see her and also monitored me through the night during delivery even though the doctor on call was also monitoring me. As a doctor, you get the feeling that she really takes care of you and that's very comforting to a pregnant mother. I would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
We have been trying to have a baby for a long time and finally it became a reality with the help of a couple of doctors.One of the doctors among them is Dr.R.Nagaveni.  First of all we want to sincerely thank Dr.Nagaveni,Duty doctors,Cleaning staff,hospital management(Rama Mam) and entire nursing staff to make our pregnancy journey so effortless and memorable. 

                           Dr.R.Nagaveni is extremely talented and have very high knowledge in her area of expertise.She is very patient,attentive and always willing to give solution to any issues we faced with respect to pregnancy. There are very few doctors who try for Normal Delivery now a days and she is one doctor who always encourages to go for Normal delivery.

                        Sometimes we don't have questions to ask her.She herself poses those questions and gives proper answers and clarity.She is always approachable through WhatsApp and phone call to resolve our doubts and provide clarifications.

                         We are happy with the medical treatment and service we received from Motherhood hospital.We are glad that we choose this hospital and would highly recommend it to anyone.

                              Dr. Nagaveni and Motherhood hospital will always be etched in our memories for the rest of our lives for fulfilling our dream of having a baby. Once again from the bottom of my heart Thank you so much doctor for everything  and we wish you all the best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nagaveni is one of the most approachable and well spoken doctors I've ever met. I visited her for treatment regarding PCOS and for a preconception visit. She was extremely patient with all our questions and gave us a very structured approach to the treatment. Under her care, I conceived within 6 months. Throughout my pregnancy, she was always present for us whenever we had any doubts. I developed gall bladder stones and was not in town at that time. The doctor made herself available and guided me over the phone regarding what to do. Towards the end of my pregnancy I developed pregnancy induced hypertension. Dr. Nagaveni was extremely vigilant regarding my BP levels and checked in almost daily with me. My delivery was a bit complicated, but Dr. Nagaveni made sure to keep me in the loop regarding whatever was going on and kept me and my husband involved in the decision making process. I finally delivered a healthy baby boy and I couldn't recommend Dr. Nagaveni more to any couple who wishes to conceive. She is an asset to whoever consults her and whichever institute she is attached to.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Exercise,Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnant Women Counseling,
review:
First thing I'm so lucky that I'm consulting with Dr. Nagaveni. 
From the first day of my Pregnancy and till my delivery i am consulting with Dr. Nagaveni. I haven't seen such doctors who personally call and get the my health status and suggest the further treatment. 

My labour room experience:
My labour pain was started at 8pm and Dr. Nagaveni checked and told contraction has not started but it was in the initial state and we admitted in the hospital and but Dr. Nagaveni was calling each hour to get the my status and exactly at 4am clock after when I my labour pain actually started we informed ma'am and she was there in 10 min and started my treatment as normal delivery, Unfortunately I was not able to push properly, tried pushing for more then 10 time but I was supporting properly in pushing from my side and After that we decided let's do last push and if it doesn't work out then will go with Scesserion. And then the magic happened in last push with great effort of Dr. Nagaveni and her staff. They did really great job and in final push my angel was out. Really appreciate the hard work of Dr. Nagaveni. We always remember the day we spent in labour room, Thanks you so much Dr. Nagaveni Ma'am. 

Great Job!!! Appreciate it!!! **** ******** Hard working!! Caring!!

review:
Its a pleasure to post a review for Dr Nagaveni ma'am. My experience with ma'am was great and helpful. She keenly monitored the weekly growth and pinpointed the issues of weight gain. In my case she helped me to control my wight in my sixth month by giving me advice on proper diet which helped a lot. It was a pleasure and happy journey with you Doctor and I wished to continue consulting with you. However as the conditions were not conducive here, I had to move to my native.
Thank you Dr Nagaveni ma'am for all the advices and help.

review: so an year ago I got to know I have pcos. My neighbour recommended me Dr.Nagaveni.. very next day I booked an appointment and got to meet her..I was all panicked and stressed when I got to know I have pcos.. but dr nagaveni calmed me down and said nothing to worry... she also told many of her patients with pcos conceived and delivered beautiful healthy babies... so not to worry.. and literally an year later i delivered my baby girl on 26th feb... she explained to me what is pcos, why it happens and because of pcos what all happens to our body.. and what can be done to treat its symptoms she treated it so well... Dr nagaveni is so polite and full of patience.. she gives you time and listens to all your problems carefully.. she explains everything in detail so that we have a good understanding of what we and our body is going through and what needs to be done... my experience with Dr Nagaveni is awesome.. she is a great doctor... tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pre and Post Delivery Care,Breast Examination,Labor and Delivery,
review:
Dr. Nagaveni was the best decision we made for our delivery. Right from the beginning, during consultation she takes time to understand your condition and explains clearly from what to eat, to what to do to help in baby development and delivery. She always recommends vaginal delivery. Don't go by her age, She is so well experienced at such young age. I had my delivery 15 days prior to the due date. As my water broke at 3am, I gave a missed call, not sure if she would be distributed. She gave me a call back immediately even if she didn't have my number saved and asked me to relax and come to the hospital immediately. I will always be grateful for her approach that night. I delivered by morning with no complications. Her treatment during and procedures post delivery was exceptional. She made sure that all the blood clots were removed for my better recovery. She made sure to visit me and examine twice daily. 
I had the best experience delivering under the able and experienced hands of Dr. Nagaveni.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My Pregnancy Journey has been very good and successful only because of Dr. Nagaveni. About the Doctor: She is very friendly, hassle free availability at clinic and the birthing center, also shares her phone number and replies to messages, gives indepth explanation of all issues, but Prudence and her timing sense are her best qualities in my opinion. She does not prescribe unnecessary tests or medications. About the Pregnancy: We hit a few bumps along the way, but with her guidence we got through it successfully. Started off with spotting in early pregnancy which continued on and off throughout the pregnancy, she prescribed bed rest and some medication to get through it. Then was diagnosed with a grade 4 placenta previa, which is a common complication during pregnancy, but comes with its own share of risks, she gave me very strict bed rest, and gave me a good roadmap on how the rest of the pregnancy would go. I was covid positive with mild symptoms, she remotely guided me through it, she also followed up on my health. The C-section: because of the placenta previa Asthma and Covid, we had to resort to a planned C-section on the 2nd of November, it went very well.... Now I am on my way to recovery. with decent hb count.... All thanks to doctor. I am very grateful to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Okay so where do I start from. The experience with Dr.Nagaveni was surreal. We met the doctor 2 years back when we were pregnant for the first time. We were really excited. Met her and she suggested few test immediately. After the tests and scans were done we got to know the baby didn't have heart beat. She was real supportive and educated us why it might have happened and until the feutus was completely removed, she suggested us to do the scans regularly to check for any infection at all. We got pregnant again in January 2020, and we were excited to see her again. We met her and as usual she suggested the test and scans to be done immediately. This time we heard the heart beat. Oh god that feeling. We came back to see her again, and she was as excited as us. After that there were regular visits to the clinic, she was always available over the phone as well. Tests and scans were done regularly. The day of the delivery she was with us all the while, talking to us, motivating us. My wife had a Normal Vaginal Delivery and it was only possible because of Dr. Nagaveni. Thank you doctor, thank you again üòä You are Awesome!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Due to the pandemic, I got stuck at my mother's place in trichy during my 1st and 2nd trimester and when  we came to Bangalore in the 3rd trimester, I was really worried if I able to meet the right doctor. By God's grace, we got to know Dr.Nagaveni through one of our relatives. From our 1sr consultation with the Doctor, I knew she was the one and there was no turning back. The way she advised us and treated me made feel like we had known her for years  and she was extremely motivating for vaginal delivery from the start which was always my desire. She made us feel very comfortable and was always available on phone for all our queries. The night I delivered my baby girl, I had called the Doctor saying I had mild contractions and she immediately responded by asking us to the come to the hospital and got me admitted and ensured I had a vaginal delivery. I was beyond satisfied with the way Doctor treated me and I would hands down recommend her for pregnancy and also her post pregnancy treatment was fabulous. She constantly kept checking on my health and the baby's health. I am extremely satisfied and happy with Dr. Nagaveni, I had a very pleasant and happy and memorable experience with herüòä.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Myself Divya Navin, delivered to our first baby at Ovum birthing centre, Kalyanagar on 26.8.20 with the reference of Dr. Nagaveni. After reading the reviews had an appointment with the doctor and visited Ovum clinic at Kothnur for checkup in the starting of my pregnancy, she explained everything clearly, shared her contact number at our first visit. She is one who treats her patients with care and take a sincere responsibility. We really chose a great doctor where I felt safe in her hands through out my pregnancy journey as she helped me clearing my queries at any point of time. She explains things not only to the patient but to the family members as well. We wanted to avoid c section as I was overweight and doctor guided me about exercise and diet during every visit. I had a labour pain 10days before the due date and was 95kg, baby weighed 3.5 had no hope of having normal delivery. After 17hours of labour pain with the doctor support and help I delivered my baby Girl in a normal way with no complications. I and my husband are completely satisfied and heartfully thank her for making our 9 months of pregnancy go in a smooth way. We surely recommend Dr. Nagaveni for our friends, relatives and who are in need of good gynecologist. Here wishing her very all the best for her work and future..

review:
I would like to thank Dr Nagaveni and appreciate following unique experience with the doctor. 
1.  She spends ample time for every patient and discusses every stuff with a lot of patience.

So I would highly recommend her to anyone else who is starting  their pregnancy journey. 
Thanks you Dr Nagaveni it was a unique experience with such a nice doctor and hope we have more and more doctors like you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was very pleased with my experience with Dr. Nagveni. I still remember the day when we were looking for a doctor who can understand the concerns of first-time expectant and guide them with much care. Plus, this was the time of the Covid-19 pandemic, when no other gynecologists were ready to see new patients and accepting only emergency cases. In that situation, I got Dr. Nagveni's mobile number from one of my friends. I contacted her and she consulted me over the phone first, and then in the coming week, I consulted her personally in Ovum, Kalyan road. After every appointment, I realized that I can't be in safer hands than this. One more noteworthy point is - she knew that am going to shift to Pune for my delivery and going to be under her treatment for just the initial 6 months of pregnancy, still, her attitude never changed. She genuinely paid attention to each of my concerns with love and care. I and my husband are truly thankful to her.  I strongly recommend Dr. Nagveni to all the would-be-Moms!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Scan,Labor and Delivery,Maternal Care/ Checkup,
review:
We would strongly recommend Dr.Nagaveni . We were new to Bangalore and went to Ovum Birthing Center for getting the check up done with Dr.Nagaveni after being referred by Dr.Gowri. Right from the first pregnancy scan till the labor we had complete support from the doctor. My wife had various complications during her pregnancy and with those we never believed it would be a normal delivery. On May-7-2020 early morning 2:15 AM her water bag broke and we rushed to the hospital. Although it‚Äôs untime, after duty doctor checked her , hospital rang Dr.Nagaveni and immediately from that time she was completely available. Since my wife blood group is rare and on top of it due to Covid issue , there was difficulties in arranging donors. Although it‚Äôs not the duty of the doctor to do, she also gave an helping hand by calling hospitals and arranged one at 3:30. This gave us some more time to arrange one more donor . All these were done just as a back up if it can‚Äôt be a normal delivery. Doctors and other staffs gave their best and with Gods grace after nearly 15 hours Of labor it was a normal delivery. All through this time baby‚Äôs heart rate and everything was monitored continuously . 
A special thanks to Dr.Nagaveni doctor as she is one of the few doctors I have seen who would be in constant touch with their patients and would reply in whatsapp anytime for queries and updates.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review:
All expecting mother goes through a cycle of doubts & anxiety and at times like this everyone desire for doctor who can patiently hear them out and calm them. Dr Nagaveni is one such person.

She has been very kind, empathetic and understanding and a truly outstanding doctor. She patiently listened to all my concerns and even ensured I followed a healthy diet and kept my weight & sugar levels in control during the entire pregnancy period. She always responds to your silliest queries, gives adequate time and always available on WhatsApp for any doubt. She always encouraged me to go for natural birth and till the last moment persuaded me to go for a normal delivery but I was too tired and fearing for safety of my child (showed 3.6 kg in last scan) I finally decided on a Cesarean. Trust me I have never seen a doctor so disappointed that we decided not to go for a normal delivery! I was blessed with a lovely baby girl and ever thankful to Doctor for her care.
 
 Dr Nagaveni has shown incredible commitment throughout providing the absolute best care, advice and treatment during every visit and for every issue. 

I am completely satisfied with her treatment and would recommend her. A very genuine, experienced *** ************* doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When I got to know that I was pregnant, me and my husband decided to consult Dr. Nagaveni mam after viewing reviews. She is friendly, caring, very professional and we felt comfortable after meeting her. review: I had a great experience with Dr Nagaveni. I was pregnant with twins and there were lot of complications like hyperthyroidism, gestational diabetes, weak cervix and Cholestasis. Dr Nagaveni took all the preventive measures and all thanks to her everything went well. Since I had weak cervix emergency cerclage was done. After the procedure I had to get admitted in hospital for few days to monitor my sugar levels. During the hospital days she used to call up the nurse station early mornings to know my sugar levels. She  was also very helpful regarding financial aspect and guided us with insurance. I had to be on bed rest for rest of the maternity period and she helped us in arranging ambulance for routine checkups. She used to ping me and enquire about my health and sugar levels and all the time. I was free to ping or call her any time to ask about any doubts and she used to respond very quickly. She is very kind and dedicated doctor and she listened to my doubts and concerns with patience. I would recommend her name to all the expecting mothers. She is the best üòä.

I was treated well and I didn't have any complications in my later stage of pregnancy. With her guidance my pregnancy journey went on in a very smooth manner.  
I was due on December 28th. As the  baby's movements were a little minimal for 3 days in my 38 weeks she suggested me to get admitted and induced the pain.

review:
I am incredibly grateful for Dr. Nagaveni's exceptional care throughout my pregnancy and, most importantly, during my baby's delivery. Her expertise and support made all the difference in ensuring a safe and successful delivery of the baby. 

From the beginning, Dr. Nagaveni showed a deep concern for my well-being. She got to know me personally and professionally, which fostered trust and confidence in her abilities. As a first-time mother, I had my share of anxieties, but Dr. Nagaveni's reassurance and calming presence always put my mind at ease. 

As my due date approached, Dr. Nagaveni meticulously monitored my progress, explaining each step of the process and what I could expect during labor. Her clear and informative communication made me feel empowered and prepared for delivery day. 

When the time came, Dr. Nagaveni demonstrated incredible skill and composure during labor. She guided me through each contraction, offering encouragement and support, while ensuring baby and I were safe. Her dedication and commitment were evident throughout the process. 

Thanks to Dr. Nagaveni's expertise and compassionate care, I had the natural birth experience I wanted. She respected my birth plan and worked collaboratively with the nursing staff to create a warm and supportive environment. Dr. Nagaveni is an exceptional obstetrician, but her genuine care for her patients truly sets her apart. She went above and beyond to make the birthing experience smooth, and I felt truly fortunate to have her by my side. 

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Nagaveni to any expectant mother seeking a compassionate and skilled obstetrician. Her dedication and passion for her work have undoubtedly left a lasting impression on me and my family. 

Thank you, Dr. Nagaveni, for being an essential part of my birthing journey and for making it a memorable and joyous experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
Our First Pregnancy with Dr. Nagaveni. Highly Recommended! Wonderful Journey and Great Experience. 

My wife Dr. Benu and I, visited for our complete Pregnancy Care - Pregnancy Test, Pregnancy Scan & Excercise and Normal Vaginal Delivery. 

Friendliness: Firstly, we appreciate the Dr. Nagaveni for being very calm, compound and so friendly which really helps us to connect with her in ease. 

Experience & Knowledge: She provide us enough time to converse and to explain the issues. She advise us in detail and ensure we understand her advise clearly. She helps us with the daily routines and meal plan with normal diet for a natural and healthy pregnancy journey. 

Treatment: We are regularly having our monthly pregnancy checkup from day one with Dr. Nagaveni and scan in every trimesters. Right from first, we had low line placenta until 34th week. She encouraged us at every visit. She prescribed us only Calcium and Iron tablet and nothing else through out our pregnancy. Having only home cooked healthy meal and prescribed fruits/ dry fruits time to time naturally. 

Normal Delivery: Yes! We had a Normal Vaginal Delivery. In the week 37 and 6 days, we got the pain in the midnight 3:30 AM and immediately we alerted the Doc. We went to the hospital and everything is ready to take care us. After 5 cm dilated at labour, though the Doctor was confident, we still opted for Epidural as we couldn't bear the pain. With Almighty's help and everyone's support in labour, we went from 5 cm to 10 cm directly in an hour and half time. And then, It's a Boy! 

Satisfaction: She taught us the exercise and have knowledge about pregnancy every month. She made sure pregnancy is not just a women's thing it's the couple where the husband also played a key role equally. And my husband had a good experience during delivery who was able to witness everything. Throughout our pregnancy any doubt, she was just a text away who replies immediately to our call and text. We felt super satisfied and happy. 

Who ever comes here to check the review - trust me, Dr. Nagaveni - *** ***** **** ** ********* *** Excellent Experience! 

We wish all the readers of our review, New Mom's, Mom to be and Dr. Nagaveni for a healthy and happy life. 

Thanks, 
Dr. Benazir & Vasim

She provided consultation even during late hours in case of emergency, and always kept us in contact through whatsapp. Sometimes she contacted us herself in order to remind us for lab tests.

She also makes sure the hospital doesn't charge extra, by clearly telling me what all procedures are done, and to call her directly in case of any billing related issues. It's difficult to find such honest doctors these days, especially in the maternity industry. 

Overall, we had a smooth and happy journey these past 10 months under the guidance of Dr. Nagaveni.

review: I was referred to Dr Nagaveni during my 5th month pragnency by another doctor. Mine was quite complicated case as the baby was detected with high risk of trisomy 13 during my 3rd month NT scan.  We were very upset as I was undergone abortion after completing 3rd moth a year back as the baby had down syndrome. Though the risk was high in my current pragnency, after meeting Dr Nagaveni, we were quite happy as she gave us lot of hope and courage by sharing her other patience experience, her own pragnency  experience which was boosted our happiness to continue with my current pragnency. The most I like in her is, she will never refer to undertake unnecessary  tests and gives very minimum medications. As I was very hesitant to disturb her, I use to just message her. But she is always responds to me in no time and calls me without fail. Her personal attachment and care with patiences is much appreciated. She always clarifies all the doubts of patiences without getting angry by giving time to them. I certainly recommend  her to family and friends to consult her.

review: We met Dr.Nagaveni for pre-pregnancy check up and continued till post delivery care.We felt safe under her guidance and never had a thought of second opinion. She is always available on phone and answers patiently to all the queries. Felt happy that she prefers normal vaginal delivery and suggested all the tips and excercise that helped during the labour.My labour room experience:My water broke at 6am and I informed Doctor, I was asked to come to the hospital for a check up. Doctor had informed the nurse in prior before we reached the hospital and I was admitted.The Doctor induced the pains and the nurses took good care and helped me do excercise under her guidance.The pains got severe at 6pm and the Doctor examined again and gave medicine for cervix dilation.By 10pm, I was fully dilated. The Doctor was taking inputs regularly and was immediately available. By 10.49pm I delivered a baby girl. All thanks to Dr.Nagaveni for helping me have a NVD and the clarity she maintains in her treatment.I would highly recommend Dr.Nagaveni for all the people planning for a pregnancy and are willing for NVD.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to Dr Nagaveni for my pregnancy consultation after seeing her reviews, and to our pleasant surprise she was available near my place. 
She is very friendly and patiently listens to all our doubts and make sure we are satisfied. She goes extra miles to take care of her patient, for me she was available 24x7 on calls/texts. Mine was a complicated pregnancy with marker in NT scan, gestational diabetes, slight increase in thyroid  levels and Cholestasis. I had to go through a couple for extra tests due to NT scan markers but she made us comfortable by explaining pros and cons of each test and what will be the best for us  and helped us in making right decision. She made sure that I take extra precautions (controlled diet) so that my sugar levels were in permissible range. I would strongly recommend to visit Dr.Nagaveni at Ovum maternity birthing center hospital, Horamayu for all gynic related issues.  You will be in the safe hands. Thank you Dr.Nagaveni. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: A very, patient, friendly and kind doctor you can meet.Our pregnancy journey during this pandemic was made easier by Dr Nagaveni by her simple home remedies, instant response and expert advise.She heard each and every thing with patient and supported for any help we needed at the clinic.She is one of the few doctors who give 100% to encourage normal deliveries.Although, we opted for a C-section due to other reasons.She was is continuous touch for any issues post delivery.When our family including the baby was tested positive for Covid, she suggested us the best physician and took the pain to help us with the observations we need to do on baby in those tough times.Along with her great Medical experience, she is also a great human being.A big Thank you to Dr Nagaveni.
